[i]Four Riders[/i] – Other Knights you control get +1/+1.
[i]Resolve[/i] – If a source would deal 4 or more noncombat damage to you or a permanent you control, it deals 3 damage instead.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Tauroneo attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
